name: Brisket Bones
short_description: Premium beef brisket bones for stock
description: Quality beef brisket bones perfect for making rich, flavorful stock and bone broth. Full of collagen and marrow for nutritious, restaurant-quality broths at home.

name: Bolar Bones
short_description: Premium beef bolar bones for stock
description: High-quality beef bolar bones ideal for creating deep, rich stocks and bone broths. Packed with nutrients and perfect for soups, stews, and sauces.

name: Free Range Eggs
description: Farm-fresh free range eggs from happy hens with access to outdoor pasture. Rich, golden yolks and superior flavor. Ethically raised for premium quality.

name: Eggs
description: Fresh, quality eggs from local farms. Perfect for baking, cooking, or breakfast. Grade A quality at an affordable price.

name: Marinades & Sauces
description: Selection of gourmet marinades and specialty sauces perfect for enhancing your meat dishes. Made with quality ingredients for restaurant-level flavor at home.

name: Potato Salad
description: Classic potato salad made fresh daily with tender potatoes, creamy dressing, and herbs. The perfect side dish for BBQs, picnics, or family meals.

name: Pasta Salad
description: Colorful pasta salad with fresh vegetables, herbs, and a zesty dressing. Made fresh in-house daily. Perfect for entertaining or quick family meals.

name: Coleslaw
description: Traditional coleslaw made fresh daily with crisp cabbage, carrots, and creamy dressing. A classic side that pairs perfectly with any meat dish.
